T02TD2795E:157b-0: @157b * // spyan ras gzigs mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2795E:158a-2: mi 'jigs sbyin pa brtan pa yis //
T02TD2795E:158a-3: sngags la phyi nang gsang dag gi //
T02TD2795E:158a-4: bar du gcod pa las sems bsrung //
T02TD2795E:158a-5: rang lus ji srid rdo rje yi //
T02TD2795E:158a-6: rang bzhin rin chen shel 'od mjes //
T02TD2795E:158a-7: bkra shis sgo stong mchod rten dbyibs //
T02TD2795E:158a-8: bcu drug phrag brgya rdo rje 'dzin //
T02TD2795E:158a-9: de nas sems ni snying gi padmo gsar pa'i 'dab //
T02TD2795E:158a-10: dmar ba'i 'od chags ge sar bye ba stong gi rtser //
T02TD2795E:158a-11: aa stong ye shes sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs //
T02TD2795E:158a-12: chu dang me long zla ba byad kyi gzugs brnyan bzhin //
T02TD2795E:158a-13: dbus su dpal chen thugs cha che //
T02TD2795E:158a-14: sor rtse bcu drug gzi brjid brtan //
T02TD2795E:158a-15: bcu bdun sum cu brgyad zhal phyag / hr'i:yig gnyis phreng gis brgyan pa'o //
T02TD2795E:158a-16: pho brang mchog la rab tu gsal ba'i 'od zer sngags bcas gzi chen kun bkram 'bar ba yi //
T02TD2795E:158a-17: rdo rje'i rdul dang ral gri be con dgra sta mdud zhags kha tv'am gri gug mnga' chen dang //
T02TD2795E:158a-18: tsha zer glog 'khyug gya gyu 'phros las rno ba'i lce phyung 'jigs pa'i rgyu gang 'di dang gzhan //
T02TD2795E:158a-19: ma lus da ltar byams pas nyer brlan snying rje'i stobs yid gcig pus nyer zhi brlag par bya //
T02TD2795E:158a-20: mgon po yi ni sngags brjod cing //
T02TD2795E:158a-21: bdug pa mchog gis bdug byas la //
T02TD2795E:158a-23: mkhas pas stong nyid bsgom par bya //
T02TD2795E:158a-24: mtsho chen nang du ri rab gzugs shar de nang me long dri med la //
T02TD2795E:158a-25: 'dam skyes mdzes 'khrungs sna tshogs bung ba dar dir sgra sgrogs khyu mang 'khrigs //
T02TD2795E:158a-26: mkha' la 'od 'gyed glog rgyun 'bab pas rmi lam yul gyi dgra 'joms pa //
T02TD2795E:158a-27: dpal chen rnams kyi rig sngags bla med ma lus 'jigs pa kun skyob yin //
T02TD2795E:158a-28: dus dang dus min 'chi ltas dang /
T02TD2795E:158a-29: mya ngan phongs pa ltas ngan dang //
T02TD2795E:158a-30: phun sum tshogs min dgra rnams las //
T02TD2795E:158a-31: legs skyob 'jig rten gsum mgon rtog / dpal mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
